column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Aspen - Thank you for the excellent review. I would say the majority of our business comes from personal referrals
column2: so I'm always grateful when customers give us a try simply based on the recommendations of friends and family. Honestly
column3: that's the best advertising there is! Also
column4: we appreciate your understanding regarding our wait times. By this time next year we will have two more JINYA outposts in Houston
column5: so we hope that might alleviate the crowds a bit. Thank you again
column6: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
